Key Match Events: Ja Morant received a technical foul after shoving LeBron James during the game.
LeBron James led the Lakers with 39 points but downplayed the heated exchange.
The Grizzlies won despite the absence of Anthony Davis and Rui Hachimura.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game ended with a final score of 131-114 in favor of the Grizzlies.
Ja Morant celebrated the victory with a Griddy dance, further taunting the Lakers.
Others: The Lakers finished their road trip at 1-4, struggling without key players.
The Grizzlies improved their season record to 5-4 with the win.
